question: Tell me the specializations of all photographers and videographers who charge 500.
sql_query1:
SELECT Visual_Art_Profession.Specialization 
FROM Visual_Art_Profession
WHERE (Visual_Art_Profession.Profession = "Photographer" OR Visual_Art_Profession.Profession = "Videographer") AND Visual_Art_Profession.Price = 500.0
sql_query2:
SELECT Visual_Art_Profession.Specialization 
FROM Visual_Art_Profession
WHERE Visual_Art_Profession.Profession = "Photographer" OR Visual_Art_Profession.Profession = "Videographer" AND Visual_Art_Profession.Price = 500.0
interpretation1: List both the photographer and videographer specializations where either charge 500.
interpretation2: Show all of the photographer specializations and also show the videographer specializations but only the ones that charge 500.
